panels.description:
Response time distributed by range from 0 to XX. Each bucket contains count of requests with response time below the margin (see bucket's name).

For example:

- 50 ms - count of responses with 0 < X < 50ms
- 100 ms - count of responses with  < X < 100ms
- 200 ms - count of responses with  < X < 200ms
- ...
- +Inf - count of responses with  < X < Infinity

Where last bucket includes all requests.

For additional information on histograms see [this article](https://prometheus.io/docs/practices/histograms/).
panels.title: HTTP Timings (total, ${host})

panels.description:
HTTP response codes:

- 1xx Informational
- 2xx Success
- 3xx Redirection
- 4xx Client Error
- 5xx Server Error

For additional info see [this article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HTTP_status_codes)
panels.title: HTTP Statuses

panels.description:
Count of requests per HTTP method:

- GET
- POST
- HEAD
- PUT
- DELETE

And others. For additional information see [this article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypertext_Transfer_Protocol#Request_methods).
panels.title: HTTP methods
